auth.RANDOM: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
auth.INCORRECT_PASSWORD: The email or username and password you entered do not match any account in our records. Please check your details and try again.
auth.PASSWORD_NOT_STRONG: Your password must be at least 8 characters long, include uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols, and cannot contain common words or predictable sequences.
auth.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: This email is already registered in the app. Please use a different email address or recover your password if you have forgotten your login details.
auth.FAILED_TO_VERIFICATE_CODE: The code you entered is not valid. Please check your details and try again.
auth.TOO_SOON_TO_SEND_ANOTHER_EMAIL: You have requested a new code too soon. Please wait a few seconds and try again.

profile.INCORRECT_PASSWORD: The old password you entered does not match your current password. Please try again.
profile.PASSWORD_NOT_STRONG: Your password must be at least 8 characters long, include uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols, and cannot contain common words or predictable sequences.
